segment.source: Language Packs (lp.cab)
segment.target: Language Packs (lp.cab)

segment.source: Language Packs (lp.cab)
segment.target: Language Packs (lp.cab)

segment.source: Language Packs (lp.cab)
segment.target: Language Packs (lp.cab)

segment.source: To design PCs that work better for customers in different regions, you can set up Windows with the right set of local languages, settings, and keyboards or other input devices.
segment.target: To design PCs that work better for customers in different regions, you can set up Windows with the right set of local languages, settings, and keyboards or other input devices.

segment.source: What's new with Language Packs for Windows 10?
segment.target: What's new with Language Packs for Windows 10?

segment.source: To help you reduce the size of your image, language packs have now been split into the following language components and Features On Demand V2 (Capabilities):
segment.target: To help you reduce the size of your image, language packs have now been split into the following language components and Features On Demand V2 (Capabilities):

segment.source: UI Text (lp.cab)
segment.target: UI Text (lp.cab)

segment.source: Basic (spell check, typing)
segment.target: Basic (spell check, typing)

segment.source: Fonts
segment.target: Fonts

segment.source: Handwriting
segment.target: Handwriting

segment.source: Optical character recognition
segment.target: Optical character recognition

segment.source: Text-to-speech
segment.target: Text-to-speech

segment.source: Speech
segment.target: Speech

segment.source: You can now choose to add only core language pack UI resources to your image, significantly reducing image size.
segment.target: You can now choose to add only core language pack UI resources to your image, significantly reducing image size.

segment.source: To preload Cortana features, add the following features on demand: UI text (lp.cab), the Basic, Text-to-Speech, and Speech language components.
segment.target: To preload Cortana features, add the following features on demand: UI text (lp.cab), the Basic, Text-to-Speech, and Speech language components.

segment.source: Not all components and features on demand are available for every language.
segment.target: Not all components and features on demand are available for every language.

segment.source: To learn more, see Add Language Packs to Windows.
segment.target: To learn more, see Add Language Packs to Windows.

segment.source: Language packs for Windows
segment.target: Language packs for Windows

segment.source: Language packs contain the text for the dialog boxes, menu items, and helpfiles that you see in Windows.
segment.target: Language packs contain the text for the dialog boxes, menu items, and helpfiles that you see in Windows.

segment.source: For some regions, language interface packs (LIPs) can provide additional translations for the most widely-used dialog boxes, menu items, and helpfile content.
segment.target: For some regions, language interface packs (LIPs) can provide additional translations for the most widely-used dialog boxes, menu items, and helpfile content.

segment.source: LIPs rely on a parent language pack to provide the remainder of the content.
segment.target: LIPs rely on a parent language pack to provide the remainder of the content.

segment.source: Get language packs and LIPs
segment.target: Get language packs and LIPs

segment.source: OEMs and System Builders with Microsoft Software License Terms can download language packs and LIPs from the Microsoft OEM site or the OEM Partner Center.
segment.target: OEMs and System Builders with Microsoft Software License Terms can download language packs and LIPs from the Microsoft OEM site or the OEM Partner Center.

segment.source: IT Professionals can download language packs from the Microsoft Volume Licensing Site.
segment.target: IT Professionals can download language packs from the Microsoft Volume Licensing Site.

segment.source: After Windows is installed, end users can download and install additional language packs and LIPs from the Language Control Panel.
segment.target: After Windows is installed, end users can download and install additional language packs and LIPs from the Language Control Panel.

segment.source: For more information, see the Local Language Program.
segment.target: For more information, see the Local Language Program.

segment.source: Related information:
segment.target: Related information:

segment.source: Available Language Packs for Windows.
segment.target: Available Language Packs for Windows.

segment.source: Lists all of the supported language packs and LIPs for multiple versions of Windows, and their identifier codes.
segment.target: Lists all of the supported language packs and LIPs for multiple versions of Windows, and their identifier codes.

segment.source: Add languages to Windows
segment.target: Add languages to Windows

segment.source: When you include more than one language or a LIP to Windows, your customers will be able to choose the language that best meets their needs during Windows OOBE.
segment.target: When you include more than one language or a LIP to Windows, your customers will be able to choose the language that best meets their needs during Windows OOBE.

segment.source: There's a few different ways to install language packs:
segment.target: There's a few different ways to install language packs:

segment.source: You can add a language pack to Windows by using the Dism /Add-Package tool.
segment.target: You can add a language pack to Windows by using the Dism /Add-Package tool.

segment.source: See Add and Remove Language Packs on a Running Windows Installation or Add and Remove Language Packs Offline Using DISM.
segment.target: See Add and Remove Language Packs on a Running Windows Installation or Add and Remove Language Packs Offline Using DISM.

segment.source: To deploy a multilingual version of Windows by using Windows Setup (for example, a corporate image Windows DVD or a set of images available on a corporate network), you can add language resources to the installation program.
segment.target: To deploy a multilingual version of Windows by using Windows Setup (for example, a corporate image Windows DVD or a set of images available on a corporate network), you can add language resources to the installation program.

segment.source: See Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution.
segment.target: See Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution.

segment.source: For corporate or network-based deployments, you may also need to update the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE) that users see when they choose how and where to install Windows to their PC.
segment.target: For corporate or network-based deployments, you may also need to update the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE) that users see when they choose how and where to install Windows to their PC.

segment.source: For more information, see WinPE: Mount and Customize.
segment.target: For more information, see WinPE: Mount and Customize.

segment.source: After Windows is installed, end users can download and install additional language packs and LIPs from the Language Control Panel.
segment.target: After Windows is installed, end users can download and install additional language packs and LIPs from the Language Control Panel.

segment.source: For more information, see the Local Language Program.
segment.target: For more information, see the Local Language Program.

segment.source: Language packs for recovery tools
segment.target: Language packs for recovery tools

segment.source: When things go wrong, the Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE) can help recover the system and data.
segment.target: When things go wrong, the Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE) can help recover the system and data.

segment.source: When you update the available languages for Windows, update the available languages in the recovery tools: Customize Windows RE.
segment.target: When you update the available languages for Windows, update the available languages in the recovery tools: Customize Windows RE.

segment.source: Prepare keyboards, time zones, and other regional settings
segment.target: Prepare keyboards, time zones, and other regional settings

segment.source: You can specify the default keyboard layout, language, or locale, either during deployment or after Windows is installed.
segment.target: You can specify the default keyboard layout, language, or locale, either during deployment or after Windows is installed.

segment.source: Configure International Settings in Windows
segment.target: Configure International Settings in Windows

segment.source: Default Input Profiles (Input Locales) in Windows: Lists the default input profiles (language and keyboard pairs) used for each region.
segment.target: Default Input Profiles (Input Locales) in Windows: Lists the default input profiles (language and keyboard pairs) used for each region.

segment.source: Default Time Zones: Lists the default time zone used for each region.
segment.target: Default Time Zones: Lists the default time zone used for each region.

segment.source: Keyboard identifiers for Windows: Lists the keyboard hexadecimal values used when configuring input profiles.
segment.target: Keyboard identifiers for Windows: Lists the keyboard hexadecimal values used when configuring input profiles.

segment.source: Languages for apps
segment.target: Languages for apps

segment.source: Many apps include support for multiple languages, though some require separate installation of language packs to work properly.
segment.target: Many apps include support for multiple languages, though some require separate installation of language packs to work properly.

segment.source: Consult with the app developer.
segment.target: Consult with the app developer.

segment.source: In general, install all of your languages onto Windows before installing apps.
segment.target: In general, install all of your languages onto Windows before installing apps.

segment.source: This helps make sure that the language resource files are available for each of the available apps.
segment.target: This helps make sure that the language resource files are available for each of the available apps.

segment.source: For more information, see Multilingual User Interface (Windows).
segment.target: For more information, see Multilingual User Interface (Windows).

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Add Language Packs to Windows
segment.target: Add Language Packs to Windows

segment.target: Features On Demand V2 (Capabilities)
